verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not control <S%H662><s%> himself before all <S%H3605><s%> those who stood <S%H5324><s%> by him, and he cried, <S%H7121><s%> "Have everyone <S%H3605><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out from me." So there was no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with him when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made <S%H3045><s%> himself known <S%H3045><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

And he wept <S%H5414><s%> <S%H6963><s%> <S%H1065><s%> so loudly <S%H6963><s%> that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [it], and the household <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [of it].

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "I am Joseph! <S%H3130><s%> Is my father still <S%H1><s%> alive <S%H5750><s%>?" But his brothers <S%H2416><s%> could <S%H251><s%> not answer <S%H3201><s%> him, for they were dismayed <S%H6030><s%> at his presence. <S%H926><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> come <S%H5066><s%> closer <S%H5066><s%> to me." And they came <S%H5066><s%> closer. <S%H5066><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> "I am your brother <S%H251><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you sold <S%H4376><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"And now <S%H6258><s%> do not be grieved <S%H6087><s%> or angry <S%H2734><s%> with yourselves, <S%H5869><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you sold <S%H4376><s%> me here; <S%H2008><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me before <S%H6440><s%> you to preserve <S%H4241><s%> life. <S%H4241><s%>

"For the famine <S%H7458><s%> [has been] in the land <S%H776><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> two years, <S%H8141><s%> and there are still <S%H5750><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> there <S%H369><s%> will be neither <S%H369><s%> plowing <S%H2758><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> harvesting. <S%H7105><s%>

"And God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me before <S%H6440><s%> you to preserve <S%H7760><s%> for you a remnant <S%H7611><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and to keep <S%H2421><s%> you alive <S%H2421><s%> by a great <S%H1419><s%> deliverance. <S%H6413><s%>

"Now, <S%H6258><s%> therefore, it was not you who sent <S%H7971><s%> me here, <S%H2008><s%> but God; <S%H430><s%> and He has made <S%H7760><s%> me a father to Pharaoh <S%H1><s%> and lord <S%H6547><s%> of all <S%H113><s%> his household <S%H3605><s%> and ruler <S%H1004><s%> over all <S%H4910><s%> the land <S%H3605><s%> of Egypt. <S%H776><s%>

"Hurry <S%H4116><s%> and go <S%H5927><s%> up to my father, and say <S%H1><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H559><s%> says <S%H3541><s%> your son <S%H559><s%> Joseph, <S%H1121><s%> "God <S%H3130><s%> has made <S%H430><s%> me lord <S%H7760><s%> of all <S%H113><s%> Egypt; <S%H3605><s%> come <S%H4714><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to me, do not delay. <S%H3381><s%>

"And you shall live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and you shall be near <S%H7138><s%> me, you and your children <S%H1121><s%> and your children <S%H1121><s%>'s children and your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have.

"There <S%H8033><s%> I will also provide <S%H3557><s%> for you, for there are still <S%H5750><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> [to come], lest <S%H6435><s%> you and your household <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have be impoverished. <S%H3423><s%>"'

"And behold, <S%H2009><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> and the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of my brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> [see], that it is my mouth <S%H6310><s%> which is speaking <S%H1696><s%> to you.

"Now you must tell <S%H5046><s%> my father of all <S%H1><s%> my splendor <S%H3605><s%> in Egypt, <S%H9202><s%> and all <S%H4714><s%> that you have seen; <S%H3605><s%> and you must hurry <S%H7200><s%> and bring <S%H4116><s%> my father down <S%H3381><s%> here. <S%H1><s%>"
Then he fell <S%H5307><s%> on his brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s neck <S%H6677><s%> and wept; <S%H1058><s%> and Benjamin wept <S%H1058><s%> on his neck. <S%H6677><s%>

And he kissed <S%H5401><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> on them, and afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with him.

Now when the news <S%H6963><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> in Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> that Joseph's brothers <S%H251><s%> had come, <S%H935><s%> it pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> Pharaoh and his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to your brothers, <S%H251><s%> 'Do <S%H6213><s%> this: <S%H2088><s%> load <S%H2943><s%> your beasts <S%H1165><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>

and take <S%H3947><s%> your father and your households <S%H1><s%> and come <S%H1004><s%> to me, and I will give <S%H935><s%> you the best <S%H5414><s%> of the land <S%H2898><s%> of Egypt <S%H776><s%> and you shall eat <S%H4714><s%> the fat <S%H398><s%> of the land. <S%H2459><s%>'

"Now you are ordered, <S%H6680><s%> 'Do <S%H6213><s%> this: <S%H2088><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> wagons <S%H5699><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for your little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> and for your wives, <S%H802><s%> and bring <S%H5375><s%> your father and come. <S%H1><s%>

'And do not concern <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5869><s%> yourselves <S%H5869><s%> with your goods, <S%H3627><s%> for the best <S%H2898><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is yours.' "

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them wagons <S%H5699><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the command <S%H6310><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them provisions <S%H6720><s%> for the journey. <S%H1870><s%>

To each <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376><s%> of them he gave <S%H5414><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of garments, <S%H8071><s%> but to Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> [pieces of] silver <S%H3701><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of garments. <S%H8071><s%>

And to his father he sent <S%H1><s%> as follows: <S%H7971><s%> ten <S%H2088><s%> donkeys <S%H6235><s%> loaded <S%H2543><s%> with the best <S%H5375><s%> things <S%H2898><s%> of Egypt, <S%H2898><s%> and ten <S%H4714><s%> female <S%H6235><s%> donkeys <S%H860><s%> loaded <S%H860><s%> with grain <S%H5375><s%> and bread <S%H1250><s%> and sustenance <S%H3899><s%> for his father on the journey. <S%H4202><s%>
So he sent <S%H7971><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> and as they departed, <S%H1980><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Do not quarrel <S%H7264><s%> on the journey. <S%H1870><s%>"
Then they went <S%H5927><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> to their father Jacob. <S%H1><s%>

And they told <S%H5046><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is still <S%H5750><s%> alive, <S%H2416><s%> and indeed <S%H3588><s%> he is ruler <S%H4910><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>" But he was stunned, <S%H6313><s%> for he did not believe <S%H539><s%> them.

When they told <S%H1696><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> that he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to them, and when he saw <S%H7200><s%> the wagons <S%H5699><s%> that Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> him, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of their father Jacob <S%H1><s%> revived. <S%H3290><s%>

Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is enough; <S%H7227><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is still <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%> I will go <S%H1980><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> him before <S%H2962><s%> I die. <S%H4191><s%>"
